content: In the meeting today we discussed adding a marker to traits to mark them object safe or not, e.g. dyn trait Foo { } - only this is object safe or static trait Foo { } - this trait is not object safe. Lots of questions about what the unmarked default should be, etc

I wanted to comment: we definitely* would* want at least a lint if an unmarked trait contains non-object safe items, because that would alert people when they make a breaking change by making a trait accidentally no longer object safe.
@boats I think you meant to post this in #t-lang, not in wg-meta?
yes, sorry, i am confused by zulip
